thread.title: BVoIP Leverages 3CX Hosted PBX into the MSP Market
thread.title_full: BVoIP Leverages 3CX Hosted PBX into the MSP Market - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: BVoIP Leverages 3CX Hosted PBX into the MSP Market
text:
BVoIP integrates 3CX with leading MSP platforms such as Autotask and ConnectWise
London, UK and Philadelphia, PA (PRWEB) October 12, 2015
3CX , developer of next-generation software-based PBX 3CX Phone System for Windows , announces its partnership with BVoIP, a premier MSP (Managed Service Provider) cloud communications partner to provide groundbreaking, cloud based PBX solutions through major MSPs.
Having already built effective integration with leading MSP solutions such as Autotask, ConnectWise, ConnectBooster and JoomConnect to name a few, BVoIP is ideally placed within the industry to revolutionize the way MSPs handle Unified Communications.
In addition to all its UC features, 3CX as a Cloud PBX provides full control over data and quality; offering a fully virtualized 3CX Phone System instance ensuring each PBX stands alone and remains unaffected by other tenants, resulting in a safe, reliable 3CX experience. This makes 3CX a highly effective, feature-rich communications tool that is paramount to MSPs striving to offer their clients a solid, stable and secure hosted PBX solution.
Nick Galea CEO of 3CX said:
‘3CX offers one of the most stable, effective and feature-rich hosted PBX solutions on the market; each user has their own virtualized instance offering unmatched security and reliability. Taking this into consideration shows just how significant the partnership between BVoIP and 3CX really is. With the recent release of v14 and its cloud-ready ability we have literally made integration with MSPs child’s play. We firmly believe this will be the start of an extremely important partnership that has the capacity to change the way MSPs approach Unified Communications. ’
George Bardissi, Founder of BVoIP said:
“MSP’s need specific things for new initiatives within their organizations to succeed. Integration with their existing systems is critical in enhancing their ability to provide solid customer service and generate a spectacular customer experience. Collaborating with 3CX creates a special opportunity for MSP’s to truly take advantage of a Best-of-Breed technology platform and utilize that to catapult them to the next level. As our core service is built on sturdy 3CX foundations, it’s only natural that an official partnership would come about.”
Managed Service Providers can be considered an evolution of the IT consulting industry, providing an all-encompassing solution to their customers. In effect, all technology and communication needs of a company are outsourced to the MSP. BVoIP’s service is designed not only to automate how MSP’s interact with their existing tools & systems but also to assist MSPs in standardizing their Unified Communications services.
Attend the Events and Find out More
If you’re interested in finding out more about BVoIP and their MSP partners, BVoIP is sponsoring a series of events in North America & Australia:
October 20th, 2015 - Melbourne, Australia – Joint MSP Learning Event
October 29th, 2015, New York, NY – Autotask Network & Learn Event
November 5th, 2015, Atlanta, GA – Autotask Network & Learn Event
November 11 – 13, 2015, Orlando, FL– ConnectWise IT Nation 2015 Conference
December 8 - 10, 2015, San Diego, CA - CRN’s NexGen Cloud Conference
About 3CX
3CX is a 100% channel company and is the developer of 3CX Phone System and 3CX WebMeeting. 3CX Phone System for Windows is a software-based, open standards platform which innovates communications and replaces proprietary PBXs. 3CX Phone System cuts telco costs and boosts company productivity and mobility with the 3CXPhone clients for iOS, Android, Mac and Windows.
3CX WebMeeting is a hassle-free web conferencing solution which leverages WebRTC technology, eliminating the need for any plugins or clients. Browser-to-browser communication and click2call as well as advanced online classroom features are just a few of the popular features of 3CX WebMeeting.
With 30,000 customers worldwide, some of the world’s leading companies and organizations use 3CX Phone System, including Boeing, McDonald's, Hugo Boss, Ramada Plaza Antwerp, Harley Davidson, Wilson Sporting Goods and Pepsi. Maintaining its global presence, 3CX has offices in the U.S., U.K., Germany, Hong Kong, South Africa, Russia and Australia. Visit 3CX on Facebook, Twitter and on Google+.
About BVoIP
BVoIP helps IT and Managed Service Providers attack voice and unified communications worldwide. Having come out of the MSP space, BVoIP designed its program to not only automate how MSP’s interact with their existing systems and tools but to also assist MSP’s with an offering to standardize their Unified Communications offering to their customers. BVoIP has built integration with MSP industry solutions from Autotask, ConnectWise, ConnectBooster, DeskDirector, BrightGauge, JoomConnect, and others. BVoIP is currently available in North America, Europe, and the Australian / New Zealand Regions. For More information please visit http://www.bvoip.com or on Facebook, Twitter, and Google+.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13015815.htm
